name: Bug Report
about: Report a bug in a skill or the repository
title: '[BUG] '
labels: bug
assignees: ''
---

## Skill Name

Which skill is affected? (e.g., DocSheriff, or "repository" for general issues)

## Describe the Bug

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Install skill '...'
2. Run command '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior

A clear description of what you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened.

## Environment

- OS: [e.g., macOS 14, Windows 11, Ubuntu 22.04]
- Claude Code version: [if applicable]
- Skill version: [from skill.json]

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or error messages here.
